This game features some very fun co-op moments when you are surviving with your friends against a killer. Playing as a killer can also be some of the best one sided action you could fine versus human players. I honestly have zero issues when playing this game and I can't think of a reason that would harm my playtime for the future. This game is an instant buy and a must have for any Steam user looking for that multiplayer action.

Não consigo recomendar esse jogo para ninguém.
Os perks e items são extremamente desbalanceados, no sentido que vindo com determinada build tu simplesmente acaba com o game dos outros.
Os perks metas são também um vício chato dos jogadores, sempre os mesmos quatro perks sendo usados repetitivamente, não há gameplay criativa no servidor brasileiro desse game.
Jogar de assassino é frustante e ao mesmo tempo muito bom, frustrante porquê a toxicidade dos sobreviventes é enorme, e muito bom quando tu destrói esses corno que ficam dando t-bag e flickando a lanterna.
Jogar de sobrevivente é muito fácil, dois três perks na tua build e teu game tá ganho, se não estiver ganho, ao menos um +1 tu leva e progride no rank fácilmente.
Não recomendo, mas jogo pra caralho.

I absolutely love this game and the devs have done a fantastic job at keeping it fresh, working, and for the most part balanced. I main killer, but play survivor with my GF (who mains survivor) and love the experience. Pretty big learning curve but once you learned the perks and what is possible you'll likely be just fine. Overall just a wonderful game and I am considered very low playtime haha.

After 398 hours of this hellscape, I think I know what I'm talking about. This game WOULD BE fun if not for some glaring issues that make me more homicidal than that invisible loser who has skipped leg day every day of his life.

Pros: 
-You can flirt with pyramid head, who is very buff
- You can get the death you crave without any real consequences
- oni
- the devs seem perfectly nice

Cons: 
- more buggy than a Florida swamp
- caters heavily to the killer, who are whiner than my one-year-old niece. and at least she has good reason, she can't even drive yet
- it takes half a lifetime to match in a game
- freddy ugly/pedo
- i have been waiting to verify my game files for the thousandth time and even after writing this review IT IS STILL NOT DONE

TLDR; if you love to suffer, this is the game for you

Edit: still awful

Edit 2: Guess who has to verify their files again

This game falls squarely in the realm of guilty pleasure. The premise is awful is so many ways, yet it is a ton of fun to play. My friends think there is something wrong with me, and they are not incorrect, but I love signing on for a few matches each day. It always gets my heart going and I love playing against the other players. The biggest challenge is to not take things personally.

So... 250 hours spent in game and I feel like I should write a short honest review at this point. if you're hesitating, DO NOT BUY THIS GAME UNLESS UNDER GUNPOINT!! It's not worth the money the developers ask for it. The game is really unique, the fanbase is awesome, if you enjoy the thirll of the hunt you'll play this game for years. However the amount of bugs that reapear in the game is overwhelming, the amount of time you'll spend waiting in the lobby waiting for 1 GAME(10,15,20,30!~minutes) will make you go crazy. This game works every now and then and after that it's broken, and you experience bugs that make you just quit playing it for a couple of months. 
If you like the idea, just download "Deceit"(it's F2P on steam) rather then buying this title for the asked price- you'll enjoy the gameplay more. The Developers struggle to eliminate a single issue with the game for weeks or months. For a few though the gameplay is worth the torture waiting several minutes of wating or getting randomly kicked out of the game beacuse the shitty anti cheat engine decides you're a hacker now and it needs to boot you out of the game. 
Summarizing: think twice, think three times before you buy this title for - cause it's good but you'll be cursing and raging for years about how badly it's beeing developed.
